§ 4212. Protection for declarants A declarant under this subchapter shall enjoy the protections of section 3059A(e) 11 See References in Text note below. of title 18. (Pub. L. 101–647, title XXV, § 2572, Nov. 29, 1990, 104 Stat. 4899.)
